" Casus Belli "

Jericho.
small town Kansas witnessed
series nuclear attacks
destroyed 23 American cities
single day.
attacks crippled
fractured US government
left town cutoff world.
Please help us.
country war,
need know it.
even worst times,
possible find best
others.

covert agent
supposed stop attacks
hunted former bosses
secret holds.
that?

dozens things
used attacks, right?
last one.

smoking gun
behind greatest crime
history world.

hostile neighboring town,

JERICHO
Saison 1 - Episode 03
" Four Horsemen "
<b>18 HEURES APRES BOMBES </b>
parle toujours pas.
vois ça.
